author: Special Correspondent
text:
GOING HOME:The fishermen rescued by the Marine Police in Thoothukudi on Friday.

Coastal Security Group police rescued a boat stranded in mid-sea with eight conch divers.

Marine Police sources said that a group of eight fishermen from Terespuram and neighbouring areas had gone for conch diving in a country boat on Friday. On reaching the diving spot around 8 a.m., they could not operate the boat owing to an engine snag.

When repeated attempts to repair the engine failed, they contacted the Coastal Security Group police around 9 a.m. who reached the spot at 11.30 a.m. and rescued the divers and the boat. They were brought to Terespuram around 1 p.m.
title: Stranded conch divers rescued
